newsArray.title: Шампионска лига: Интригуващи сблъсъци в четвъртия кръг
newsArray.description: С девет мача във вторник, 4 ноември ще бъде даден старт на четвъртия кръг от основната фаза на Шампионска лига. Безспорно два от най-интригуващите мачове от кръга са Ливърпул – Реал Мадрид и Пари Сен Жермен – Байерн Мюнхен, които са с начален час 22 българско време....

newsArray.description: Earlier, the fans in India were left disappointed after the Portuguese did not travel with the team for the match against FC Goa on October 22. Making his appearance in the Saudi Pro League, Ronaldo has been scoring for Al Nassr

newsArray.title: Football Video Support (FVS) to debut in Malta Premier
newsArray.description: Football Video Support (FVS) will be introduced for the first time in Maltese domestic football. This milestone has been made possible thanks to the initiative of the Malta Premier, in collaboration with the Malta Football Association, and through the collective... newsArray.title: CAF Conducts Draw for 2025/26 Champions League Group Stage
newsArray.description: News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, News Ghana, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/caf-conducts-draw-for-2025-26-champions-league-group-stage/The Confederation of African Football (CAF) has finalized the group stage draw for its 2025/26 Champions League tournament. Nigeria’s Rivers United will compete in Group A against Egypt’s Pyramids FC, Morocco’s RS Berkane, and Zambia’s Power Dynamos. The group stage will begin on the weekend of November 21-23. The tournament will then pause for the [...] News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, News Ghana, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/caf-conducts-draw-for-2025-26-champions-league-group-stage/
creator: News Ghana
